練習
1. 創造名為grade的dictionary物件存這些資訊
```{python}
grade={
"number": [172,214,322,425,517],
"name": ["a","b","c","d","e"],
"score": [80,60,90,70,50]
}
grade
```

2. 取出成績的value
```{python}
grade["score"]
```

3.1 取出"小明",及80
```{python}
grade["name"][0]
grade["score"][0]
{grade["name"][0]:grade["score"][0]} # 大括號表示是dictionary
```

3.2
```{python}
{
grade["name"][i]:grade["score"][i] for i in [0,1,2,3,4]
}
```
